The installation instructions incorrectly place the 'pip install' command before the instruction to create and activate a Python virtual environment, which would install the package in the global Python environment.
correction_candidates: First set up a Python virtual environment, then run `pip install --editable .`
Run `pip install --user --editable .` and then create a virtual environment.
Run `python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install --editable .`
errors.golden_answer: First set up a Python virtual environment, then run `pip install --editable .`
